To study effect whole-body vibration hypobaric hypoxia visual contrast sensitivity . 3 . To se increase cytokine biomarkers different hypobaric hypoxic condition Our main hypothesis whole-body vibration may cause PaO2 drop low level , give altitude ; would case vibration present .
